component.name: addMetaToResource
component.description: This operation takes a meta, and adds the profiles, tags, and security labels found in it to the nominated resource.

component.name: closureTableMaintenance
component.description: This operation provides support for ongoing maintenance of a client-side closure table based on server-side terminological logic.

component.name: deleteMetaForResource
component.description: This operation takes a meta, and deletes the profiles, tags, and security labels found in it from the nominated resource.

component.name: fetchEncounterRecord
component.description: This operation is used to return all the information related to an encounter described in the resource on which this operation is invoked.

component.name: fetchPatientRecord
component.description: This operation is used to return all the information related to the patient described in the resource on which this operation is invoked.

component.name: fetchPatientRecordById
component.description: This operation is used to return all the information related to the patient by Id described in the resource on which this operation is invoked.

component.name: findFunctionalList
component.description: This operation allows a client to find an identified list for a particular function by its function.

component.name: generateDocument
component.description: A client can ask a server to generate a fully bundled document from a composition resource.

component.name: listMetaByResourceType
component.description: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the resource type.

component.name: listMetaBySystem
component.description: A list of all profiles, tags and security labels in use by the system.

component.name: listMetaByVersionOfResource
component.description: A list of all profiles, tags, and security labels for the current version of the resource.

component.name: processMessage
component.description: This operation accepts a message, processes it according to the definition of the event in the message header, and returns a one or more response messages.

component.name: translateCode
component.description: Translate a code from one value set to another, based on the existing value set and concept maps resources, and/or other additional knowledge available to the server.

component.name: translateCodeById
component.description: Translate a code from one value set to another, based on the existing value set and concept maps resources, and/or other additional knowledge available to the server.

component.name: validateResource
component.description: The validate operation checks whether the attached content would be acceptable either generally, as a create, an update or as a delete to an existing resource.
